name: Lapse Demo
description: So this is a demo for something I've been working on for a while now, it is my first ever game I have created, and I used RPG Maker MV.  Right now, it is just as a pilot for the storyline and there is only about 30 minutes-1 hours worth of gameplay. The finished product will have more puzzle-like features and will build more on the story. I'd appreciate a download as it will help pay my college fees and help me make better games. I hope you enjoy, please tell me what you think! <3
